Enum SFDCAccessController.SharingMode

Enclosing class:
SFDCAccessController
public static enum SFDCAccessController.SharingMode

SharingMode - this enum defines the sharing mode to be used.
You can set the sharing mode in the constructor or later using the setSharingMode() method. If you use the default constructor, we will set it to WITH.

Enum Constant Summary
INHERIT
          Will use the class instance that just inherits from the class that calls this class.
WITH
          Will use the class instance that enforces "with sharing".
WITHOUT
          Will use the class instance that enforces "without sharing".
 
Enum Constant Detail

WITH

public static final SFDCAccessController.SharingMode WITH
Will use the class instance that enforces "with sharing".

WITHOUT

public static final SFDCAccessController.SharingMode WITHOUT
Will use the class instance that enforces "without sharing".

INHERIT

public static final SFDCAccessController.SharingMode INHERIT
Will use the class instance that just inherits from the class that calls this class.
